name: Navy Battle 2 v5.9
description:
====About the Game====

This is the sequel to one of my most popular games Navy Battle. In this version I completely changed the game mechanics, and added different goals for each level. 

====Controls====

WASD to move

Arrow Keys to fire Cannon Balls

Space to Lay Ocean Mines

WA to steer plane

In plane mode, Space to launch Torpedo

NOTE:You can only fire off of the long sides of your ship, not in front or in the back of you.

====Goal====

Your goal is to destroy the enemy ships before they destroy you! If you are fighting the iron clad you must survive the deadly ram, and keep your distance from the iron ship.
